title: Malcolm Gladwell Plus: Talking to voters with Jacqueline Alemany, Kyle Trygstad
description: Washington Post's Jacqueline Alemany and National Journal's Kyle Trygstad talk races and give a Democratic debate preview, while author Malcolm Gladwell asks the question: Why are there so many failures of communication between strangers?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
